children.text: saśrīkaṃ prabhayā yutaṃ rucirayā prodbhāsitaṃ gaṅgayā
tasya putro 'sti kedāraḥ śivapādārcane rataḥ // KVrk_1.2 //

body.text: vedānāmarthā vedārthāḥ / śivo devatā yeṣāṃ tāni śaivāni śāstrāṇi / vedārthāśca śaivaśāstrāṇi ca tāni jānātīti sa tathoktaḥ ya

children.text: / vṛttāni śrīprabhṛtīni tānyeva ratnāni teṣāmākara utpattisthānam / kimarthaṃ /
lokānāṃ śaṃ sukhaṃ karotīti lokaśaṃkarastam / punaḥ kathaṃbhūtam /
gaurī ca vināyakaśca gaurīvināyakau tābhyāṃ upetaṃ saṃyutam / kimartham /
/ sukhaṃ paraṃ brahmānandātmakaṃ saṃtānaḥ putrapautrādi tayoḥ siddhiḥ prāptistadarthaṃ sukhasaṃtānasiddhyartham /
loke bhavaṃ na vaidikaṃ / kāvyādiṣu tasyānupayogāt /
tyāha / mātrābhedena āryādi varṇabhedena śrīprabhṛti vṛttabhedeneti || 4 ||
samastaṃ vāṅmayaṃ vyāptaṃ trailokyamiva viṣṇunā // KVrk_1.6 //
gmadhyādyau jbhau trilo no 'ṣṭau bhavantyatra gaṇāstrikāḥ // KVrk_1.7 //
mukhamādi aṃtarmadhyaṃ ādau madhye laghū yayostau mukhāntarlau yagaṇaragaṇau ( ^ _ _, _ ^ _) /
/ aṃte avasāne gurulaghū yayostau sagaṇatagaṇau yathā ( ^ ^ _, _ _ ^) /
/ guru madhye ādau yayostau jagaṇabhagaṇau yathā ( ^ _ ^, _ ^ ^) /
varṇavṛttagaṇā bhavantītyarthaḥ / mātrāgaṇānāṃ vakṣyamāṇasūtre vidhānāt / caturgurvādīnāmapi gaṇādisaṃjñā mā bhūdityāśaṃkya niyamannāha /
iti trayaḥ parimāṇaṃ yeṣāṃ te trikā iti || 7 ||
sarve ca te ādiśca madhyaṃ ca antaśca sarvādimadhyāṃtāsteṣu guravo yeṣāṃ te sarvādimadhyāntaguravaḥ /
vā pādāntastvasau gvakro jñeyo 'nyo mātṛko lṛjuḥ // KVrk_1.9 // iti /
vartamāno laghurapi vibhāṣayā guruḥ syāt / sa ca kavisamayavyavahārāt dvitīyacaturthayoreva pādayorante veditavyaḥ / yathā /

body.text:
prāyaḥ samāsannaparābhavānāṃ dhiyo viparyastatamā bhavanti /
asaṃbhave hemamayasya jantostathā 'pi rāmo lulubhe mṛgāya // iti /

tathā ca /
‘śriyaḥ patiḥ śrīmati śāsituṃ jagajjagannivāso vasudevasadmani'; ityādi dṛṣṭavyam /
sa ca prastāre

children.text: / anusvarādirahito anyo mātṛko ekamātro varṇo laghurbhavati / sa ca prastāre ṛjuḥ saralaḥ || 9 ||

body.text: yuktaparāśca ya ityanena prāpte gurutve apavādamāha /

children.text: ucyate / pūrvācāryāṇāṃ piṃgalanāgaprabhṛtīnāṃ kālidāsādīnāṃ ca kavīnāṃ samayaḥ parigṛhītaḥ / saṃyogaḥ kramasaṃyogaḥ || 10 ||
taruṇaṃ sarṣapaśākaṃ navaudanaṃ picchalāni ca dadhīni /
tava hriyāpahriyā mama hrīrabhūt śaśigṛhe 'pi hṛtaṃ na dhṛtā tataḥ /
vahalabhrāmarameṣakatāmasam mama priye kva sa yeṣyati tatpunaḥ //

body.text:
mamaiva te hṛte / yathā /
snehādgehādbhujagatanayālokakautūhalena sthūlottuṃgastanabharalasanmadhyabhaṃgānapekṣāḥ /
paurā nāryastaralanayanānandamutpādayantyo dhāvanti sma drutamapahriyaḥ sraṃsamānottarīyāḥ // iti /
bodhapradīpe 'pi yathā /

children.text: dhṛtvā dhṛtvā sapadi vilayaṃ bhūbhujaḥ saṃprayātāḥ //

body.text:
śiśupālavadhe yathā /
prāptanābhihṛdamajjanamāśu prasthitaṃ nivasanagrahaṇāya / iti /

tathā ca /
bhramati bhramaramārīkānane vipramukte / ityādi /

children.text: sthitaśayitavibuddhaprītikaste bhramo 'yaṃ bhramasi bhramara yena tvaṃ mudhā ketakeṣu //

asamagravilokanena kiṃ te dayitaṃ paśya varoru nirviśaṃkā /
na hi jātu kuśāgrapītamambhaḥ sucireṇāpi karotyapetatṛṣṇam // iti

body.text:
‘ājahratustaccaraṇau pṛthivyāmi'ti /
tathā ca /
pradyotasya priyaduhitaraṃ vatsarājo 'tra jahre /

kundāvadātairbhavato yaśobhiḥ śubhrīkṛtaṃ kiṃ paramāravīra /
adyāpi yadbibhrati kālimānamarātinārīvadanotpalāni // ityādi /

children.text:
/
tathāpi /
taruṇaṃ sarṣapaśākaṃ navodanaṃ picchalāni dadhīni /
alpavyayena suṃdari grāmyajano miṣṭamaśnāti / ityudāharaṇamāryayā pradarśitam / āryāyāṃ pādavyavasthā nāsti / pūrvārdhottarārdhagrahaṇāt pūrvārdhottarārdhamityāryālakṣaṇaṃ kurvāṇo granthakāra evaṃ jñāpayati / tāvadāryāyāṃ pādavyavasthā nāsti paiṃgalīyasūtrapāṭhācca / svarā 'rdhañcāryārdhamiti /

body.text: tadyathā / catvāro 'bdhivedāḥ / pañca śarendriyāṇi / ṣaṭcartavaḥ / sapta svararṣayaḥ / aṣṭau vasavaḥ / nava naṃdarandhrāṇi / daśa diśāḥ / ekādaśa rudrāḥ / dvādaśādityāḥ / trayodaśa viśvedevāḥ / caturdaśa bhuvanāni / pañcadaśa tithaya ityādi /

children.text: / vakṣyamāṇalakṣaṇasya vṛttasya caturthāṃśo bhāgaḥ pādasaṃjño bhavet /

/ yatirvirāmādirācāryapāraṃparyāgatā saṃjñeyamadhyātpadacchinnākṣareṣu kartavyā / abdhyādi śabdāddhi sāṃkāḥ kṛtvā yatirityanena saha saṃbadhyante / ityayamarthaḥ śiṣyanti /
tatrāhurācāryāḥ /

yathā /
śriyaḥ śreyakapolau tu sampūrṇendusamaprabhau
pratibimbaṃ hareryatra kastūrī maṇḍanāyate / ityādinetvevaṃ yathā /
namastasmai mahādevāya śaśikhaṇḍadhāriṇe / iti /

body.text:
agādityaṃtyavyañjanasyāṃtaḥpureṇetyakāreṇa saha saṃdhirna bhavati /
samāse 'pi na tvevaṃ yathā /
surāsuraśiroratnasphuraccaraṇamañjarī-
piṃjarīkṛtapādābjadvandvaṃ vandāmahe śivamiti /

children.text:
/
vyaktavibhaktike prakaṭavibhaktike / avyaktavibhaktike samāsāntavibhaktike / tayorudāharaṇaṃ yathā /
‘yakṣaścakre janakatanayāsnānapuṇyodakeṣu'; iti /
vyaktāvyaktavibhaktika iti yatiḥ sarvatra pādānta ityanena saha saṃbadhyate / vastrīkṛtajagatkālaṃ kaṇṭhekālaṃ namāmyaham /
mahākālaṃ kalāśeṣaṃ śaśilekhāśikhāmaṇim //

padamadhyayatirpadānte mā bhūt / yathā /
‘praṇamata bhavabaṃdhakleśanāśāya nārāyaṇacaraṇasarojadvandvamānaṃ dahetu'riti //

yathā /
‘etasyāṃ gaṇḍatalamamalaṃ gāhave candrakakṣāmiti /
‘etāsāṃ rājati sumanasāṃ dāmakaṇṭhāvalambī'ti /
‘saṃtāpaṃ me janayati nitambo 'yamindīvarākṣyā'; iti /

body.text:
asyārthaḥ / yo yaṃ pūrvaparayorekadeśaḥ svarasaṃdhau vidhīyate sa kvacitpūrvāntavadbhavati kvacitparasyādivat /
pūrvāntavadyathā /
syādasthāne 'pagatayamunāsaṃgame vā 'bhirāmā / tathā /
jambhārātībhakumbhodbhavamiva dadhataḥ sāndrasindūrareṇum iti /
parādivadbhāvo yathā / mamaiva vyāyoge /
ye svārātividāritāsyasahasaivābhūdvibhinnaṃ raṇe
vāmāṃgaṃ kalakiṃkaṇīphalakavannistṛṃśavaddakṣiṇam /
ekaṃ ghātanipātadattamitaradghātapratīkārakṛd-
dhanyaḥ paśyati yudhyamānamiti sasvāṃgaṃ vimānasthitaḥ // ityādi /

children.text:
/
tebhyaḥ pūrvā yatirna kartavyetyarthaḥ / yathā /
‘svāduḥsvacchaṃdasalilamidaṃ prītaye kasya na syādi'ti /

tebhyaḥ parā yatirna kartavyetyarthaḥ / yathā /
‘duḥkhaṃ me prakṣipati hṛdaye duḥsahastadviyogaḥ'; ityādi sarvamūhyam || 12 ||
samamardhasamaṃ vṛttaṃ viṣamaṃ ca tathā param // KVrk_1.13(2) //
ti / tatra samaṃ sarvāvayavatvātsamam śrīprabhṛti ardhasamamupacitrādi viṣamaṃ padacaturūrdhādi /
vṛttasya prathamatṛtīyapādau tulyalakṣaṇau bhavataḥ / dvitīyacaturthau ca / ta

body.text: yasya vṛttasya caturṣvapi pādeṣu bhinnamanyādṛśaṃ parasparaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ bhavati

children.text: pṛthak chando bhavet pādair yāvat ṣaḍviṃśatiṃ gatam // KVrk_1.17 //
bhavanti / śeṣamiti prakaraṇam / tacca śāstrāntarebhyo 'vagantavyam / granthagauravabhayātkedāreṇātra noktam /
gāyatryuṣṇiganuṣṭup ca bṛhatī paṃktireva ca // KVrk_1.19 //
triṣṭup ca jagatī caiva tathā 'tijagatī matā /
śarkarī sātipūrvā syādaṣṭyatyaṣṭī tataḥ smṛteḥ // KVrk_1.20 //
ityuktā chaṃdasāṃ saṃjñāḥ kramaśo vacmi sāmpratam /

/ iti chaṃdasāṃ saṃjñā uktāḥ /
adhunā sarveṣāṃ vṛttānāṃ lakṣaṇamabhidhāsyāmi / lakṣyate jñāyate aneneti
lakṣmaitatsapta gaṇā gopetā bhavati neha viṣame jaḥ /
ṣaṣṭho 'yaṃ ca nalaghu vā prathame 'rdhe niyatamāryāyāḥ // KVrk_2.1 //
carame 'rdhe paṃcamake tasmādiha bhavati ṣaṣṭho laḥ // KVrk_2.2 //
iti / iha āryālakṣaṇe viṣame sthāne prathamatṛtīyādau jo jagaṇo na bhavati /
ti / ṣaṣṭhe gaṇe sarvalaghau dvitīyāllaghvakṣarādārabhya padaṃ bhavati / saptamaścetsarvalaghugaṇo bhavati tadā prathamākṣarādārabhya padaṃ

dvitīye 'rdhe paṃcame sarvalaghau gaṇe tasmātpūrvoktāt / prathamākṣarāllaghvakṣarādārabhya padaniyamo bhavati / iti / atrārdhagrahaṇātpādavyavasthā nāstīti etacca prathamādhyāya eva padādāviti sūtre prapaṃcitamasti /
prītiṃ kasya na janayati prakurvatī keśabaṃdhanaṃ nārī /

body.text: capaleti nāma tasyāḥ prakīrtitā nāgarājena // KVrk_2.5 //

children.text: dvitīyacaturthau gurvormadhyagau gamadhyagau gamadhyagāviti / vadatā sūtrakṛtā gaṇaniyama uktaḥ / tathā hi
prathamo gaṇo 'ntagurureva tṛtīyo gaṇo dvigurureva paṃcamaścādigurureveti niścayaḥ
capalākṣi maunamudrāṃ tyajeti saṃbhāṣitā mayā sutanuḥ /

body.text: ādyaṃ dalaṃ samastaṃ bhajellakṣma capalāgataṃ yasyāḥ /
śeṣe pūrvajalakṣmā mukhacapalā soditā muninā // KVrk_2.6 //
dalayoḥ kṛtayatiśobhāṃ tāṃ gītiṃ gītivānbhujaṅgeśaḥ // KVrk_2.8 //

children.text: yāḥ prathame 'rdhe yaduktaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ tadyadi dvayorapyardhayorbhavati tāṃ
sadyo manāṃsi madayati gītiḥ strīṇāṃ madena mattānām || 8 ||
āryāyā uttarārdhalakṣaṇaṃ pūrvārdhe bhavati pūrvārdhalakṣaṇamuttarārdhe sā

body.text: ṣaḍviṣame 'ṣṭau same kalāstāśca same syurno nirantarāḥ /
na samā 'tra parāśritā kalā vaitālīye 'nte ralau guruḥ // KVrk_2.12 //
siṃhāvalokitanyāyena ‘tṛtīyayugdakṣiṇāntike'tyādisūtrapaṭhitaḥ pādaśabdo 'tra dṛṣṭavyaḥ / paiṃgalīyasūtrapādaśabdopādānāt / yathā ‘vaitālīyaṃ dviḥsvarā 'yukpādeṣu sarvo 'ntalā'; iti / yatra

children.text: tṛtīyapaṃcamādyāśritā na bhavati / same pāde dvitīye caturthe nirgatamaṃtaraṃ vyavadhānaṃ yāsāṃ tā nirantarā aṃtararahitā laghavo na bhaveyurityarthaḥ / yathā /
virahe tava sā varāṃganā vaitālīyamuvāha vibhramam || 12 ||
paryante ryau tathaiva śeṣaṃ aupacchaṃdasikaṃ sudhībhiruktam // KVrk_2.13 //
śaṭhavṛttamimaṃ drutaṃ vayasye aupacchaṃdasikaṃ vimuñca kāntam || 13 ||
vati / viśeṣoktau bhagaṇātparau gau gurū bhavataḥ tadā vaitālīyame
ripavo jahati sma bhayārtā āpātalikāṃ saṃgarabhūmim //

body.text:
āpātalikāṃ asthirāmityarthaḥ /
uktaṃ ca piṃgalavṛttau bhaṭṭaśrīhalāyudhena / yathā /

children.text: na saha yukto bhavati ‘na samā 'tra parāśritā kale'ti bādhitvā tadā dakṣiṇāntikā nāma / yathā /
ghuragrimena tṛtīyena laghunā saha yujyate tadā vaitālīyame

body.text: pūrveṇa yuto 'tha paṃcamaḥ prācyavṛttiruditeti yugmayoḥ // KVrk_2.17 //

children.text: laghuḥ pūrveṇa caturthena laghunā saha yukto yadā syāttadā
na kasya cetaḥ samanmathaṃ karoti sā suṃdarākṛtiḥ /
vaktraṃ nādyānnasau syātāmabdheryo anuṣṭubhi khyātam // KVrk_2.21 //

body.text: yasyāṃ laḥ saptamo yugme sā yugmavipulā matā // KVrk_2.25 //

children.text: nāma / nanu pathyālakṣaṇasāmyātpunaruktametat / naivam / vipulādhikārasyedānīmārabhyamānatvāt vinā 'nutpattiḥ pathyālakṣaṇaṃ tvayukpāde avaśyameva yagaṇena bhavitavyam / atra tu na niyamaḥ / yathā /
prītiḥ svakāntayā sārdhaṃ vipulā jāyate gṛhe || 25 ||
cāryasya matena caturṣvapi pādeṣu saptamo laghuḥ kartavyaḥ / yathā /
yasyāṃ laḥ saptamo yugme sā yugmavipulā mate'ti sarvamanuvartanīyam /
ayukpādayoḥ prathamatṛtīyayoścaturthyādakṣarātparayo yagaṇaṃ bādhitvā bhagaṇaścedbhavati tadā bhenopalakṣitā vipulā syāt

body.text: ayujoriti jātipakṣe dvayorapi pādayorgrahaṇam vyaktipakṣe punarekasya / ekapakṣe punaḥ prathamasya tṛtīyasya vā tathā cāhurmahākavayaḥ /

children.text: tathā jitaḥ śatruvargo rājan bāhubalena te /

body.text:
vyaktipakṣe prathamapāde yathā /
[mahākavikālidāsavasvāgdevatāgurum /
yajñāne viṣayābhyānti darpaṇe pratibimbavat /]
tṛtīyapāde yathā /
kāminībhiḥ saha prītiḥ kasya nāma na rocate /
yadi na syādvārivīcicaṃcalaṃ hata jīvitam // iti || 28 ||

vyaktipakṣe prathamapāde yathā /
tava maṃtrakṛto maṃtrairdūrātsaṃśamitāribhiḥ /
pratyādiśyanta iva me dṛṣṭalakṣyabhidaḥ śarāḥ // ityādi || 29 ||

children.text:
tyarthaḥ / yathā /
tṛṣṇeyaṃ re tāta śriyaṃ saṃcitāṃ vipulāṃ hare -
dvihāya tasmāttāṃ bhava sukhī vairāgyasampadā //

yathā mamaiva chandasi /
‘ambudhau natabharamasā auje tadyutavipulā bhavet'; / yathā /

vyaktipakṣe prathamapāde yathā /
manobhirāmāḥ śṛṇvantau rathanemisvanonmukhaiḥ /
atha pradoṣe doṣajñaḥ saṃveśāya viśāṃpatim // iti /
upasthiteyaṃ kalyāṇī nāmni kīrtita eva yaditi //

body.text: kṣaṇavidhvaṃsini kāye kā cintā maraṇe raṇe / iti /

children.text: sarveṣāṃ vipulābhedānāṃ caturtho varṇaḥ prāyeṇa gururbhavati / ityāmnāyaḥ || ||

body.text:
‘dvikaguṇitavasulaghu'rityanuvartate / yadā acaladhṛtireva gurvanto bhavati navamośca laghureva tadā mātrāsamakaṃ nāma /
prāksūtrāllaghurityanuvartamāne 'pi ‘navamo li'ti vadatā sūtrakāreṇānyeṣāṃ laghu vo 'nujñātastasmā'

children.text: muñcati tṛṇamiva gatavikalpaḥ putraṃ priyamaviślokaṃ yataḥ /
asmākaṃ vānavāsikā strī cetaḥprītiṃ sapadi vidhatte || 34 ||
dṛṣṭvā tava ripunagare śūnye citrāni dhavalagṛhabhittīnām /
mānaṃ mānini muñca bhaja tvaṃ kāntaṃ yāvaditīritamālyā /
aniyatamamaryādaṃ vṛttānāṃ parimāṇaṃ tena sahitam / ko 'rthaḥ / mātrāsamakādīnāṃ pañcānāmapi pādairyaiḥ kaiścidapi caturbhiḥ
kathaya sakhi tvaṃ kva nu me vyaktaṃ pādākulakaṃ gacchasi naktam //
kvacidapi na bhavati bhikṣāhāniḥ tatkiṃ kriyate mānamlāniḥ //
vṛttasya lo vinā varṇairgā varṇā gurubhistathā /
guravo lairdale nityaṃ pramāṇamiti niścitam // KVrk_2.38 //
tāḥ kalā gurubhirvinā varṇā na bhavanti /

'rdhe kṛte sati guravo bhavanti / yathā / asminneva vṛtte ekapaṃcāśatkalāvarṇaiḥ dvātriṃśadbhirvinā ekonaviṃśatiguravoḥ bhavanti / punastā eva mātrā ekonaviṃśatyā gurubhirvinā dvātriṃśadbhavanti / punastā kalā ekapaṃcāśattrayodaśabhirlaghubhirvinā aṣṭatriṃśadbhavanti / tato
saha guruṇā vartateti saguru yadā bhavati tadā

body.text: śrutisukhakṛdiyamapi jagati jaśira upagatavati ñi sati bhavati khajā // KVrk_2.40 //

children.text: dvābhyāṃ guṇitā 'ṣṭau guravo yasyāḥ sā ṣoḍaśaguruḥ prathame 'rdhe tvaparamapyardhaṃ vasubhiraṣṭabhirguṇitāḥ salilanidhilaghava iti dvātriṃśatsaṃkhyā laiḥ racitapadavitatiḥ anaṃgakrīḍā nāma /

body.text: tribhirguṇitārnava laghavo yasyāṃ sā tathoktā saptāviṃśallaghurityarthaḥ /

children.text: ryasyāḥ sā tathoktā iti pūrvoktaprakāreṇa saptaviṃśallaghavo 'nte guruḥ evaṃ

body.text: iti sulhaṇaviracitāyāṃ sukavihadayānandinyābhidhānāyāṃ vṛttaratnākaracchaṃdovṛttau mātrāvṛttādhyāyo dvitīyaḥ samāptaḥ //
ekākṣarāyāṃ jātau eko gururyasya vṛttasya pāde tadvṛttaṃ
yatra bhagaṇo dvau gurū bhavataḥ tadvṛttaṃ
nagaṇanagaṇaguravo yatra tadvṛttaṃ madhumatī nāma / yathā || 10 ||
mo mo go go vidyunmālā // KVrk_3.14 //
dvau magaṇau dvau gurū ca yatra tadvṛttaṃ

children.text: vyomni vyāpte taptarekhānākurvantī vaṃgyāṃmānamrāṃ tvāṃ bhartuḥ strīṇāṃ jāgaryakā vidyunmālā || (??) 14 ||

children.text: naṃkān samālikhet / yathā / asminneva caturākṣare chaṃdasi ekaṃ vṛttaṃ uddiṣṭaṃ tasya dvau varṇau gurū tato laghustato 'pi guruḥ / tatra uddiṣṭe vṛtte laghuni tiṣṭhantīti laghusthā ye punaraṃkāścatvāraḥ taiścaturbhiḥ saikaiḥ ekena sahitaiḥ paṃcabhiruddiṣṭaṃ bhavet / uddiṣṭasaṃkhyā bhavet / caturakṣarāyāṃ jātau tatpaṃcamaṃ vṛttaṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ || 5 ||

iti vīpsavaśādekadaiva sthitimaṃtareṇa nikṣiptatvāt punarnikṣepabhāvādekaikatyāgaśca na saṃbhavati tasmātsvarūpeṇa sthita eva upari kṣipyate / tato dvitīye sthāne dvau varṇau bhavataḥ tau tṛtīyena kṣipyeta tatra trayo bhavanti / tacca caturthe nikṣipyante te catvāro bhavanti / ‘

uparitanamekaṃ tyajyate tatra na kṣipyate ityarthaḥ / vīpsā ta eva adhobhāgāt punarnikṣepe kriyā pravartate tena adhaḥsthita eva eko dvitīye sthāne nikṣipyate tatra ca trayo bhavanti / tacca tṛtīye nikṣipyante tatra ṣaṭbhavanti upari ekaṃ tyajannivarteta / ādyaṃ ekaṃ vṛttaṃ sarvaguruḥ tasmāddekadvyādilagukriyā pravartete / tata ekaḥ sarvaguruḥ catvāri dvilaghūni ṣaṭtrilaghūni catvāri caturlaghūni ekaṃ sarvalaghuḥ eṣā lagukriyā sarvalaghuprastāreṇa pratīyate asyāstu eṣa eva kramaḥ paṃcākṣarādivṛtteṣvapi || 6-7 ||

bhavet / iyaṃ tāvaddhāraṇaṃ syāt / tathā ekaścatvāraḥ ṣaṭcatvāraḥ ekameṣāmekīkṛtā vai ṣoḍaśa bhavanti caturakṣarajātau prastāryamāṇāyāṃ ṣoḍaśa vṛttāni bhavantītyarthaḥ / sa ca prastāraḥ pūrvameva vyākhyātaḥ /
saṃkhyām / yathā / caturakṣarajātau dviguṇā ye aṃkā uparyāropitāsteṣāṃ samāhāraḥ paṃcadaśa saikaḥ ṣoḍaśeti || 8 ||
